◆ UpdateBackgroundProcessReturnState

enum Slic3r::GUI::Plater::priv::UpdateBackgroundProcessReturnState
Enumerator
UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_RESTART 
UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_REFRESH_SCENE 
UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_INVALID 
UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_FORCE_RESTART 
UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_FORCE_EXPORT 
1861 {
1862 // update_background_process() reports, that the Print / SLAPrint was updated in a way,
1863 // that the background process was invalidated and it needs to be re-run.
1864 UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_RESTART = 1,
1865 // update_background_process() reports, that the Print / SLAPrint was updated in a way,
1866 // that a scene needs to be refreshed (you should call _3DScene::reload_scene(canvas3Dwidget, false))
1867 UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_REFRESH_SCENE = 2,
1868 // update_background_process() reports, that the Print / SLAPrint is invalid, and the error message
1869 // was sent to the status line.
1870 UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_INVALID = 4,
1871 // Restart even if the background processing is disabled.
1872 UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_FORCE_RESTART = 8,
1873 // Restart for G-code (or SLA zip) export or upload.
1874 UPDATE_BACKGROUND_PROCESS_FORCE_EXPORT = 16,
1875 };

◆ can_fix_through_netfabb()

bool Slic3r::GUI::Plater::priv::can_fix_through_netfabb ( ) const
4777{
4778 std::vector<int> obj_idxs, vol_idxs;
4779 sidebar->obj_list()->get_selection_indexes(obj_idxs, vol_idxs);
4780
4781#if FIX_THROUGH_NETFABB_ALWAYS
4782 // Fixing always.
4783 return ! obj_idxs.empty() || ! vol_idxs.empty();
4784#else // FIX_THROUGH_NETFABB_ALWAYS
4785 // Fixing only if the model is not manifold.

4788 if (model.objects[obj_idx]->get_repaired_errors_count() > 0)

4796 return true;
4797 return false;
4798#endif // FIX_THROUGH_NETFABB_ALWAYS

◆ can_reload_from_disk()

bool Slic3r::GUI::Plater::priv::can_reload_from_disk ( ) const
4729{
4730 if (sidebar->obj_list()->has_selected_cut_object())
4731 return false;
4732
4733 // collect selected reloadable ModelVolumes
4734 std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> selected_volumes = reloadable_volumes(model, get_selection());
4735 // nothing to reload, return
4736 if (selected_volumes.empty())
4737 return false;
4738
4739 std::sort(selected_volumes.begin(), selected_volumes.end(), [](const std::pair<int, int>& v1, const std::pair<int, int>& v2) {
4740 return (v1.first < v2.first) || (v1.first == v2.first && v1.second < v2.second);
4741 });
4742 selected_volumes.erase(std::unique(selected_volumes.begin(), selected_volumes.end(), [](const std::pair<int, int>& v1, const std::pair<int, int>& v2) {
4743 return (v1.first == v2.first) && (v1.second == v2.second); }), selected_volumes.end());
4744
4745 // collects paths of files to load
4746 std::vector<fs::path> paths;
4747 for (auto [obj_idx, vol_idx] : selected_volumes) {
4748 paths.push_back(model.objects[obj_idx]->volumes[vol_idx]->source.input_file);
4749 }
4750
4751 std::sort(paths.begin(), paths.end());
4752 paths.erase(std::unique(paths.begin(), paths.end()), paths.end());
4753
4754 return !paths.empty();
4755}

2454 // is the only system that needed the workarounds in the first place.

2794 }

◆ on_process_completed()

void Slic3r::GUI::Plater::priv::on_process_completed ( SlicingProcessCompletedEvent &  evt)
4264{
4265 // Stop the background task, wait until the thread goes into the "Idle" state.
4266 // At this point of time the thread should be either finished or canceled,
4267 // so the following call just confirms, that the produced data were consumed.
4268 this->background_process.stop();
4269// this->statusbar()->reset_cancel_callback();
4270// this->statusbar()->stop_busy();
4271 notification_manager->set_slicing_progress_export_possible();
4272
4273 // Reset the "export G-code path" name, so that the automatic background processing will be enabled again.
4274 this->background_process.reset_export();
4275 // This bool stops showing export finished notification even when process_completed_with_error is false
4276 bool has_error = false;
4277 if (evt.error()) {
4278 std::pair<std::string, bool> message = evt.format_error_message();
4279 if (evt.critical_error()) {
4280 if (q->m_tracking_popup_menu) {
4281 // We don't want to pop-up a message box when tracking a pop-up menu.
4282 // We postpone the error message instead.
4283 q->m_tracking_popup_menu_error_message = message.first;
4284 } else {
4285 show_error(q, message.first, message.second);
4286 notification_manager->set_slicing_progress_hidden();
4287 notification_manager->stop_delayed_notifications_of_type(NotificationType::ExportOngoing);
4288 }
4289 } else
4290 notification_manager->push_slicing_error_notification(message.first);
4291// this->statusbar()->set_status_text(from_u8(message.first));
4292 if (evt.invalidate_plater())
4293 {
4294 const wxString invalid_str = _L("Invalid data");
4295 for (auto btn : { ActionButtonType::abReslice, ActionButtonType::abSendGCode, ActionButtonType::abExport })
4296 sidebar->set_btn_label(btn, invalid_str);
4297 process_completed_with_error = true;
4298 }
4299 has_error = true;
4300 }
4301 if (evt.cancelled()) {
4302// this->statusbar()->set_status_text(_L("Cancelled"));
4303 this->notification_manager->set_slicing_progress_canceled(_u8L("Slicing Cancelled."));
4304 }
4305
4306 this->sidebar->show_sliced_info_sizer(evt.success());
4307
4308 // This updates the "Slice now", "Export G-code", "Arrange" buttons status.
4309 // Namely, it refreshes the "Out of print bed" property of all the ModelObjects, and it enables
4310 // the "Slice now" and "Export G-code" buttons based on their "out of bed" status.
4311 this->object_list_changed();
4312
4313 // refresh preview
4314 if (view3D->is_dragging()) // updating scene now would interfere with the gizmo dragging
4315 delayed_scene_refresh = true;
4316 else {
4317 if (this->printer_technology == ptFFF)
4318 this->update_fff_scene();
4319 else
4320 this->update_sla_scene();
4321 }
4322
4323 if (evt.cancelled()) {
4324 if (wxGetApp().get_mode() == comSimple)
4325 sidebar->set_btn_label(ActionButtonType::abReslice, "Slice now");
4326 show_action_buttons(true);
4327 } else {
4328 if(wxGetApp().get_mode() == comSimple) {
4329 show_action_buttons(false);
4330 }
4331 if (exporting_status != ExportingStatus::NOT_EXPORTING && !has_error) {
4332 notification_manager->stop_delayed_notifications_of_type(NotificationType::ExportOngoing);
4333 notification_manager->close_notification_of_type(NotificationType::ExportOngoing);
4334 }
4335 // If writing to removable drive was scheduled, show notification with eject button
4336 if (exporting_status == ExportingStatus::EXPORTING_TO_REMOVABLE && !has_error) {
4337 show_action_buttons(false);
4338 notification_manager->push_exporting_finished_notification(last_output_path, last_output_dir_path,
4339 // Don't offer the "Eject" button on ChromeOS, the Linux side has no control over it.
4340 platform_flavor() != PlatformFlavor::LinuxOnChromium);
4341 wxGetApp().removable_drive_manager()->set_exporting_finished(true);
4342 }else if (exporting_status == ExportingStatus::EXPORTING_TO_LOCAL && !has_error)
4343 notification_manager->push_exporting_finished_notification(last_output_path, last_output_dir_path, false);
4344 }
4345 exporting_status = ExportingStatus::NOT_EXPORTING;
4346}

3668 std::sort(selected_volumes.begin(), selected_volumes.end(), [](const std::pair<int, int>& v1, const std::pair<int, int>& v2) {
3669 return (v1.first < v2.first) || (v1.first == v2.first && v1.second < v2.second);
3670 });
3671
3672 selected_volumes.erase(std::unique(selected_volumes.begin(), selected_volumes.end(), [](const std::pair<int, int>& v1, const std::pair<int, int>& v2) {
3673 return (v1.first == v2.first) && (v1.second == v2.second); }), selected_volumes.end());
3674
3675 // collects paths of files to load
3676 std::vector<fs::path> input_paths;
3677 std::vector<fs::path> missing_input_paths;
3678 std::vector<std::pair<fs::path, fs::path>> replace_paths;
3679 for (auto [obj_idx, vol_idx] : selected_volumes) {
3680 const ModelObject* object = model.objects[obj_idx];
3681 const ModelVolume* volume = object->volumes[vol_idx];
3682 if (fs::exists(volume->source.input_file))
3683 input_paths.push_back(volume->source.input_file);
3684 else {
3685 // searches the source in the same folder containing the object
3686 bool found = false;
3687 if (!object->input_file.empty()) {
3688 fs::path object_path = fs::path(object->input_file).remove_filename();
3689 if (!object_path.empty()) {
3690 object_path /= fs::path(volume->source.input_file).filename();
3691 if (fs::exists(object_path)) {
3692 input_paths.push_back(object_path);
3693 found = true;
3694 }
3695 }
3696 }
3697 if (!found)
3698 missing_input_paths.push_back(volume->source.input_file);
3699 }
3700 }
3701
3702 std::sort(missing_input_paths.begin(), missing_input_paths.end());
3703 missing_input_paths.erase(std::unique(missing_input_paths.begin(), missing_input_paths.end()), missing_input_paths.end());
3704
3705 while (!missing_input_paths.empty()) {
3706 // ask user to select the missing file
3707 fs::path search = missing_input_paths.back();
3708 wxString title = _L("Please select the file to reload");
3709#if defined(__APPLE__)
3710 title += " (" + from_u8(search.filename().string()) + ")";
3711#endif // __APPLE__
3712 title += ":";
3713 wxFileDialog dialog(q, title, "", from_u8(search.filename().string()), file_wildcards(FT_MODEL), wxFD_OPEN | wxFD_FILE_MUST_EXIST);
3714 if (dialog.ShowModal() != wxID_OK)
3715 return;
3716
3717 std::string sel_filename_path = dialog.GetPath().ToUTF8().data();
3718 std::string sel_filename = fs::path(sel_filename_path).filename().string();
3719 if (boost::algorithm::iequals(search.filename().string(), sel_filename)) {
3720 input_paths.push_back(sel_filename_path);
3721 missing_input_paths.pop_back();
3722
3723 fs::path sel_path = fs::path(sel_filename_path).remove_filename().string();
3724
3725 std::vector<fs::path>::iterator it = missing_input_paths.begin();
3726 while (it != missing_input_paths.end()) {
3727 // try to use the path of the selected file with all remaining missing files
3728 fs::path repathed_filename = sel_path;
3729 repathed_filename /= it->filename();
3730 if (fs::exists(repathed_filename)) {
3731 input_paths.push_back(repathed_filename.string());
3732 it = missing_input_paths.erase(it);
3733 }
3734 else
3735 ++it;
3736 }
3737 }
3738 else {
3739 wxString message = _L("The selected file") + " (" + from_u8(sel_filename) + ") " +
3740 _L("differs from the original file") + " (" + from_u8(search.filename().string()) + ").\n" + _L("Do you want to replace it") + " ?";
3741 //wxMessageDialog dlg(q, message, wxMessageBoxCaptionStr, wxYES_NO | wxYES_DEFAULT | wxICON_QUESTION);
3742 MessageDialog dlg(q, message, wxMessageBoxCaptionStr, wxYES_NO | wxYES_DEFAULT | wxICON_QUESTION);
3743 if (dlg.ShowModal() == wxID_YES)
3744 replace_paths.emplace_back(search, sel_filename_path);
3745
3746 missing_input_paths.pop_back();
3747 }
3748 }

3750 std::sort(input_paths.begin(), input_paths.end());
3751 input_paths.erase(std::unique(input_paths.begin(), input_paths.end()), input_paths.end());
3752
3753 std::sort(replace_paths.begin(), replace_paths.end());
3754 replace_paths.erase(std::unique(replace_paths.begin(), replace_paths.end()), replace_paths.end());
3755
3756 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(q, _L("Reload from disk"));
3757
3758 std::vector<wxString> fail_list;
3759
3760 Busy busy(_L("Reload from:"), q->get_current_canvas3D()->get_wxglcanvas());
3761
3762 // load one file at a time
3763 for (size_t i = 0; i < input_paths.size(); ++i) {
3764 const auto& path = input_paths[i].string();
3765
3766 busy.update(_L("Reload from:") + " " + from_u8(path));
3767
3768 Model new_model;
3769 try
3770 {
3771 new_model = Model::read_from_file(path, nullptr, nullptr, Model::LoadAttribute::AddDefaultInstances);
3772 for (ModelObject* model_object : new_model.objects) {
3773 model_object->center_around_origin();
3774 model_object->ensure_on_bed();
3775 }
3776 }
3777 catch (std::exception& e)
3778 {
3779 // error while loading
3780 busy.reset();
3781 GUI::show_error(q, e.what());
3782 return;
3783 }
3784
3785 // update the selected volumes whose source is the current file
3786 for (auto [obj_idx, vol_idx] : selected_volumes) {
3787 ModelObject* old_model_object = model.objects[obj_idx];
3788 ModelVolume* old_volume = old_model_object->volumes[vol_idx];
3789
3790 bool sinking = old_model_object->min_z() < SINKING_Z_THRESHOLD;
3791
3792 bool has_source = !old_volume->source.input_file.empty() && boost::algorithm::iequals(fs::path(old_volume->source.input_file).filename().string(), fs::path(path).filename().string());
3793 bool has_name = !old_volume->name.empty() && boost::algorithm::iequals(old_volume->name, fs::path(path).filename().string());
3794 if (has_source || has_name) {
3795 int new_volume_idx = -1;
3796 int new_object_idx = -1;
3797 bool match_found = false;
3798 // take idxs from the matching volume
3799 if (has_source && old_volume->source.object_idx < int(new_model.objects.size())) {
3800 const ModelObject* obj = new_model.objects[old_volume->source.object_idx];
3801 if (old_volume->source.volume_idx < int(obj->volumes.size())) {
3802 if (obj->volumes[old_volume->source.volume_idx]->name == old_volume->name) {
3803 new_volume_idx = old_volume->source.volume_idx;
3804 new_object_idx = old_volume->source.object_idx;
3805 match_found = true;
3806 }
3807 }
3808 }
3809
3810 if (!match_found && has_name) {
3811 // take idxs from the 1st matching volume
3812 for (size_t o = 0; o < new_model.objects.size(); ++o) {
3813 ModelObject* obj = new_model.objects[o];
3814 bool found = false;
3815 for (size_t v = 0; v < obj->volumes.size(); ++v) {
3816 if (obj->volumes[v]->name == old_volume->name) {
3817 new_volume_idx = (int)v;
3818 new_object_idx = (int)o;
3819 found = true;
3820 break;
3821 }
3822 }
3823 if (found)
3824 break;
3825 }
3826 }
3827
3828 if (new_object_idx < 0 || int(new_model.objects.size()) <= new_object_idx) {
3829 fail_list.push_back(from_u8(has_source ? old_volume->source.input_file : old_volume->name));
3830 continue;
3831 }
3832 ModelObject* new_model_object = new_model.objects[new_object_idx];
3833 if (new_volume_idx < 0 || int(new_model_object->volumes.size()) <= new_volume_idx) {
3834 fail_list.push_back(from_u8(has_source ? old_volume->source.input_file : old_volume->name));
3835 continue;
3836 }
3837
3838 old_model_object->add_volume(*new_model_object->volumes[new_volume_idx]);
3839 ModelVolume* new_volume = old_model_object->volumes.back();
3840 new_volume->set_new_unique_id();
3841 new_volume->config.apply(old_volume->config);
3842 new_volume->set_type(old_volume->type());
3843 new_volume->set_material_id(old_volume->material_id());
3844 new_volume->set_transformation(
3845 old_volume->get_transformation().get_matrix() *
3846 old_volume->source.transform.get_matrix_no_offset() *
3847 Geometry::translation_transform(new_volume->source.mesh_offset - old_volume->source.mesh_offset) *
3848 new_volume->source.transform.get_matrix_no_offset().inverse()
3849 );
3850 new_volume->source.object_idx = old_volume->source.object_idx;
3851 new_volume->source.volume_idx = old_volume->source.volume_idx;
3852 assert(!old_volume->source.is_converted_from_inches || !old_volume->source.is_converted_from_meters);
3853 if (old_volume->source.is_converted_from_inches)
3854 new_volume->convert_from_imperial_units();
3855 else if (old_volume->source.is_converted_from_meters)
3856 new_volume->convert_from_meters();
3857 std::swap(old_model_object->volumes[vol_idx], old_model_object->volumes.back());
3858 old_model_object->delete_volume(old_model_object->volumes.size() - 1);
3859 if (!sinking)
3860 old_model_object->ensure_on_bed();
3861 old_model_object->sort_volumes(get_config_bool("order_volumes"));
3862
3863 sla::reproject_points_and_holes(old_model_object);
3864
3865 // Fix warning icon in object list
3866 wxGetApp().obj_list()->update_item_error_icon(obj_idx, vol_idx);
3867 }
3868 }
3869 }
3870
3871 busy.reset();
3872
3873 for (auto [src, dest] : replace_paths) {
3874 for (auto [obj_idx, vol_idx] : selected_volumes) {
3875 if (boost::algorithm::iequals(model.objects[obj_idx]->volumes[vol_idx]->source.input_file, src.string()))
3876 replace_volume_with_stl(obj_idx, vol_idx, dest, "");
3877 }
3878 }
3879
3880 if (!fail_list.empty()) {
3881 wxString message = _L("Unable to reload:") + "\n";
3882 for (const wxString& s : fail_list) {
3883 message += s + "\n";
3884 }
3885 //wxMessageDialog dlg(q, message, _L("Error during reload"), wxOK | wxOK_DEFAULT | wxICON_WARNING);
3886 MessageDialog dlg(q, message, _L("Error during reload"), wxOK | wxOK_DEFAULT | wxICON_WARNING);
3887 dlg.ShowModal();

3151 Slic3r::GUI::warning_catcher(q, _L("The selected object couldn't be split because it contains only one solid part."));
3152 else
3153 {
3154 // If we splited object which is contain some parts/modifiers then all non-solid parts (modifiers) were deleted
3155 if (current_model_object->volumes.size() > 1 && current_model_object->volumes.size() != new_objects.size())
3156 notification_manager->push_notification(NotificationType::CustomNotification,
3157 NotificationManager::NotificationLevel::PrintInfoNotificationLevel,
3158 _u8L("All non-solid parts (modifiers) were deleted"));
3159
3160 Plater::TakeSnapshot snapshot(q, _L("Split to Objects"));
3161
3162 remove(obj_idx);
3163
3164 // load all model objects at once, otherwise the plate would be rearranged after each one
3165 // causing original positions not to be kept
3166 std::vector<size_t> idxs = load_model_objects(new_objects);
3167
3168 // clear previosli selection
3169 get_selection().clear();
3170 // select newly added objects
3171 for (size_t idx : idxs)
3172 {
3173 get_selection().add_object((unsigned int)idx, false);
3174 // update printable state for new volumes on canvas3D
3175 q->canvas3D()->update_instance_printable_state_for_object(idx);
3176 }
3177 }
3178}
